6. The Tampa Hispanic Consumer They are younger 41 yrs The average age of the Tampa Hispanic is 41 years vs. 49 years for the Non-Hispanic. They are Home Owners 64% of Hispanic’s in Tampa own their own home They live in larger households of Hispanics in Tampa live in households They are Bi-lingual 74% with 3+ Persons vs. 44% for the Non- Hispanic Tampa Household. They speak Spanish in the home 71% 79% of Tampa Hispanics speak of Tampa Hispanics speak Spanish at Both Spanish and English. home. Source: Tampa Scarborough Release 2 2012 A18+ 9721 Executive Center Drive North, Suite 200 | St. Petersburg, FL 33702 | 727-579-1925 6
